thread.title: DIARY- Emerging Markets Economic Events to Sept 2
thread.title_full: DIARY- Emerging Markets Economic Events to Sept 2 | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: DIARY- Emerging Markets Economic Events to Sept 2
text:
Aug 22 (Reuters) -
For other diaries, please see:
Top economic events
Government debt auctions
Political and general news events
Index of all diaries
Guide to economic indicators
** This Diary is filed daily ***
MONDAY, AUGUST 24 JERUSALEM - Bank of Israel announces interest rate decision - 1300 GMT.
TUESDAY, AUGUST 25
BUDAPEST - Central bank of Hungary rate-setting meeting - 1200 GMT.
THURSDAY, AUGUST 27 VIENNA - Western Balkans Summit. German Chancellor Angela Merkel, EU foreign policy chief Federica Mogherini, European Commission Vice President Maros Sefcovic, European Bank for Reconstruction and Development President Sir Suma Chakrabarti and prime ministers of Italy, Serbia, Slovenia, Croatia and Albania to attend. PRETORIA - South African Finance Minister Nhlanhla Nene speaks at Land Bank financial results presentation - 1100 GMT. KIGALI - National Bank of Rwanda holds monetary policy meeting - 0630 GMT.
FRIDAY, AUGUST 28 SANTIAGO - Central Bank of Chile will publish the minutes of August interest rate meeting - 1130 GMT.
TUESDAY, SEPTEMBER 1
BRASILIA - Brazilian central bank holds monetary policy committee meeting (to Sept. 2). WARSAW - National Bank of Poland holds Monetary Policy Council meeting (to Sept. 2). WEDNESDAY, SEPTEMBER 2 WARSAW - National Bank of Poland announces rate decision - 0930 GMT. BRASILIA - Brazilian central bank announces rate decision - 2200 GMT.
